DocAttribute.Name: ProfileType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Defines the type of geometry into which this profile definition shall be resolved, either a curve or a surface area. In case of curve the profile should be referenced by a swept surface, in case of area the profile should be referenced by a swept area solid.

DocAttribute.Name: ProfileName
DocAttribute.Documentation: Human-readable name of the profile, for example according to a standard profile table. As noted above, machine-readable standardized profile designations should be provided in _IfcExternalReference.ItemReference_.

DocAttribute.Name: HasExternalReference
HasProperties
